description: This is an integration test script written in Dart for a Flutter application. It automates navigation through key screens (Home, Matches, Chat, Profile, Filter) and captures screenshots at each stage. The script interacts with UI elements such as BottomNavigationBar, buttons, icons, and handles dynamic locating of UI components.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point for the integration test; navigates through key app screens and captures screenshots.

methods.name: takeShot
methods.description: Helper function that captures and saves a screenshot with a specified name in the designated directory.
